title: Ticket #2361: support the rosetta setup at bakerlab
description:
support the bakerlab in its efforts to set up condor to relialby run their rosetta jobs on OSG resources.

Milestones

  1. 20110812 Start production runs - we are all ready on our end, just waiting for the users to submit jobs, and also desire Rosetta to fix a bug in their code to avoid what should be a unnecessary wrapper script. Although Zach proclaims the wrapper script is beautiful, a gem of scripting, a shining example of coding goodness.
